message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for sale at a price of $95. I believe it will be very valuable to you.
Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer but $95 is a bit more than I'm willing to pay right now. I'm interested in the product, but I'd be happy to pay $85 for it. What do you think?
Hi Bob, I understand your position. How about we meet in the middle at $90?
